org.apache.james.mailbox.store.search

Class LazyMessageSearchIndex<Id>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.james.mailbox.store.search.ListeningMessageSearchIndex<Id>
      • org.apache.james.mailbox.store.search.LazyMessageSearchIndex<Id>
  • Type Parameters:
    Id -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    MailboxListener, MessageSearchIndex<Id>

    public class LazyMessageSearchIndex<Id>
extends ListeningMessageSearchIndex<Id>
    ListeningMessageSearchIndex implementation which wraps another ListeningMessageSearchIndex and will forward all calls to it. The only special thing about this is that it will index all the mails in the mailbox on the first call of search(MailboxSession, Mailbox, SearchQuery) This class is mostly useful for in-memory indexes or for indexed that should be recreated on every server restart.

      • search

        public Iterator<Long> search(MailboxSession session,
                    Mailbox<Id> mailbox,
                    SearchQuery searchQuery)
                      throws MailboxException
        Lazy index the mailbox on first search request if it was not indexed before. After indexing is done it delegate the search request to the wrapped MessageSearchIndex. Be aware that concurrent search requests are blocked on the same "not-yet-indexed" mailbox till it the index process was complete
        Returns:
        Iterator on found uids
        Throws:
        MailboxException
